hero.title: Custom Songs for Your Special Moments
hero.subtitle: Proposals, weddings, tributes ‚Äî made with love. Create personalized music that tells your unique story.

features.title: How It Works
features.subtitle: Creating your personalized song is simple and magical

step1.title: Tell Your Story
step1.description: Answer a few questions about your special moment, the person, and the emotions you want to convey.

step2.title: AI Creates Your Song
step2.description: Our advanced AI composes a unique melody and writes personalized lyrics just for you.

step3.title: Receive Your Masterpiece
step3.description: Get your custom song delivered in high quality, ready to share with the world.

pricing.title: Transparent Plans
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees. No surprises. Just professional quality music.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.description: We accept credit cards via Cakto. 100% secure and encrypted payment.

deliveryTime.title: Delivery Time
deliveryTime.description: Your personalized music is delivered within 48 hours after payment confirmation.

whatsIncluded.title: What's included?
whatsIncluded.description: High-quality MP3 file, personalized cover in high resolution and complete song lyrics.

guarantee.title: Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you're not satisfied, we'll make adjustments at no additional cost. Your happiness is our priority.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating your custom song

musicStyles.question: What musical styles do you produce?
musicStyles.answer: We produce music in all styles: Pop, Rock, MPB, Country, Forr√≥, Jazz, Gospel, Reggae, Electronic and much more. Our musicians are specialists in each genre.

deliveryTimes.question: How do delivery times work?
deliveryTimes.answer: In the Standard plan, your music is ready in up to 7 days. In the Express plan, we deliver in up to 48 hours. You receive a preview before final release.

whatYouGet.question: What do I receive at the end?
whatYouGet.answer: You receive a high-quality MP3 file, personalized cover in high resolution and the complete lyrics of the song. You can download and use as many times as you want.

commercialUse.question: Can I use the music commercially?
commercialUse.answer: Yes! You have total rights over the created music. You can use it in events, social media, brand campaigns or any other purpose.

footer.description: Creating personalized music for life's most special moments.

vinyl.title: Listen to an Example
vinyl.subtitle: Each track is produced with real instruments and professional vocals

quiz.title: Tell Us About Your Special Moment
quiz.subtitle: Help us create the perfect song for you

questions.emotions: What emotions do you want to convey?
questions.style: What music style do you prefer?
questions.name: What's the name?
questions.nameHint: Add pronunciation for clarity (e.g., Alicia, ah-lee-sha)
questions.styleDescription: Select the musical style for your personalized song
questions.vocalDescription: We recommend choosing the gender that best fits the personality of the song
questions.qualitiesDescription: Describe the character and qualities you value
questions.qualitiesPlaceholder: Are they patient, wise, funny, protective, encouraging? What makes them the amazing person they are?
questions.memoriesDescription: What moments with them do you value most?
questions.memoriesPlaceholder: Share how you met, special years, inside jokes, or moments that made your relationship unique...
questions.heartMessageDescription: Write anything you feel would be relevant to include in the song, and we'll do our best to include it!
questions.heartMessagePlaceholder: What do you want them to know, feel or remember?

messages.dataLoaded: Data loaded! You can review and edit your answers.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using MusicLovely, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

services.title: 2. Services Offered
services.content: MusicLovely offers personalized music creation services. We are committed to delivering high-quality products within established deadlines (7 days for Standard Plan, 48 hours for Express Plan).

copyright.title: 3. Copyright and Ownership
copyright.content: When purchasing a personalized song, you receive personal and commercial usage rights for the created music. MusicLovely retains copyright over the musical composition, but grants you a perpetual and irrevocable license to use the music as you wish.

payments.title: 4. Payments and Refunds
payments.content: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. In case of dissatisfaction, we offer free revisions. Refunds are evaluated on a case-by-case basis.

acceptableUse.title: 5. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use our services only for legal purposes and in accordance with these Terms. It is not permitted to use the service to create illegal, defamatory content or content that violates third-party rights.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: MusicLovely is not responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our services.

modifications.title: 7. Terms Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication on the website.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us through our contact page.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
information.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as name, email, payment information, and details about the music you want to create.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to: create and deliver your personalized music, process payments, send updates about your order, and improve our services.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to process payments (Stripe) or when required by law.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on the site, keep you logged in, and analyze site traffic. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We keep your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill legal obligations. Created songs are stored indefinitely in your account.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or notice on our website.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, contact us through our contact page.
